title: Virginia Tech’s Wofford Pipeline Pays Off With ACC Tournament Title - Sports Illustrated
content:
1. Virginia Tech’s Wofford Pipeline Pays Off With ACC Tournament Title  Sports Illustrated
  2. Virginia Tech stuns Duke as No. 7 seed, wins first ACC tournament title  ESPN
  3. Virginia Tech claims ACC crown for first time in program history  VT hokiesports.com
  4. Virginia Tech denies Duke, Coach K another ACC tournament title  USA TODAY
  5. Virginia Tech had 'no doubt' it would win the ACC Tournament title -- now it's Duke facing big questions  CBS Sports
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Hokies won their first ACC tournament in program history behind a bunch of figures with ties to the Southern Conference’s Wofford Terriers.
